name: Coffee Talk Front-End Splash, Start, and Options Demo
name_original: Coffee Talk Front-End Splash, Start, and Options Demo
description: This is a demo I created for a Game Interface Design course. For the demo, I reverse engineered the front-end of the Toge Productions game "Coffee Talk". This includes recreating the splash sequence as well as the Start and Options menus. I DO NOT own the rights to "Coffee Talk:" nor did I create any of the original  assets and music found in the demo. You can try a playable build of the front-end demo here!
